content.p: The Press Office is part of Communications and Advocacy. Acting as a first point of contact for the UK and international media enquiries, the team promotes and defends the University's reputation through a variety of channels. If you are a member of staff at the university and would like more information about working with the media and how the Press Office cab help you, please visit our Sharepoint site. To contact the Press Office, please call 0115 951 5798 or email pressoffice@nottingham.ac.uk For out-of-hours emergencies only please call 07971 884887 and leave a message. We are responsible for: To access help with any of the above, please get in touch. Head of News Media Relations Manager for Medicine and Health Sciences Media Relations Manager - Engineering Media Relations Manager for Science Media Relations Manager - Arts and Social Sciences
